channel.title: Power BI on Robert Myles McDonnell
channel.description: Recent content in Power BI on Robert Myles McDonnell

item.title: Customize Interactive R Visuals in Power BI
item.description: Some of us, through no fault of our own, have to work with things like Power BI. While it’s a powerful application, it’s just a little…you know. For anybody who works with R, Python or JavaScript or anything like that, it just feels like closing the black box a bit, not to mention reproducibility problems. The good thing about Power BI is that you can hack at it a little, and we can get the majority of R’s graphing power into it.
